idea: Occult Studios is a one-stop-hub for Film Production, Visual Effects and Design. Since its inception, Occult Studios has carved a niche for itself in the world of CGI Animation and VFX. A creative hot bed where exchange of ideas forms the genesis of our work, we stand for 'Quality' and 'Commitment', which is the key to creating and delivering world class standards. We treat each project with equal amount of passion and its our constant endeavor to push the boundaries, in a bid to achieve high standards of quality. Be it Feature Films, Advertising Films or Animation, we have the expertise to create spell binding images for each one of the mediums.
name: OCCULT STUDIOS LLP

idea: Sociochat Incorporation, India-based company managed by Sociochat Communications Private Limited, provides a dedicated Indian social media platform that keeps its users' privacy as their priority and people can share their personal views and they can even chat with the members on the network. The best, unique, and catchy thing about them isthat they do reward their users with some points for using the application and once they attain a particular threshold, then the users can redeem those points for coupons of eCommerce websites like Amazon.in, Flipkart, Myntra, and so on.
name: SOCIOCHAT COMMUNICATIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
FinLearn Academy is a Trading & Investment education initiative delivered through both physical classroom and online platforms. Vastly researched and relevant trading and investing programs across all asset classes â€“ Stocks, Futures, Options, Commodities and Currencies are designed and delivered by experienced instructors. Bringing state-of-the-art technology and diverse mediums of program delivery, FinLearn Academy is creating an immense financial learning opportunity for people who want to excel in this field. We are passionate about providing innovative, practical and affordable trading and investment education while mentoring all traders at a one-on-one level. We ensure that each program is designed and delivered in a customized fashion to suit the needs of every individual trainee so that they can achieve their learning goals.


FinLearn was founded with the vision to empower individual traders reach their professional potential by providing the most engaging learning environment & to be respected and appreciated by our mentees for outstanding quality of work in Trading & Investment education.
name: FINLEARN EDUTECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Since 2019, ARMKO PIPE FITTINGS (I) PVT. LTD. has manufactured flange, elbow, tee, reduction, reducers, caps, cross, stubend / lapjoint, forged fitting materials for oil and natural gas pipelines, refinery and petro chemistry facilities, nuclear power and electricity production plants, refinement and extrication plants, dams and hydroelectric power plants and shipbuilding industry.

ARMKO PIPE FITTINGS (I) PVT. LTD. Manufacturing activity continues in 9000 square meter open area 3000 square meter factory and administrative building area.

A has a capacity of fulfilling all the demands of the sector through the manufacture of carbon steel, stainless steel, alloy steel, high nickel alloys, inconel, monel, alloy 20, copper nickel and specific steel groups.

The capacity of 4000 tons / year, ARMKO PIPE FITTINGS (I) PVT. LTD. has % 40 export rates and ARMKO PIPE FITTINGS, direct and regular exporting includes 66 countries.

As a manufacturer company, ARMKO PIPE FITTINGS (I) PVT. LTD. owns the documents of CE, PED, ISO 9001, ISO 14001 and OHSAS 18001. ARMKO PIPE FITTINGS (I) PVT. LTD. gives test certificate, which are compliant to EN 10204 3,1B and contains physical and chemical testing.
name: ARMKO PIPE FITTINGS (I) PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
To carry on in India and abroad the business of distributors, transporter, traders, retailers, marketing and suppliers by creating online link

with the customer, to advertise and promote the business online for distribution of petrol, diesel, Light diesel, High speed diesel, LPG,

Engine Oil, CNG, CBG, LNG and other related products with the help of an ecommerce website and/or mobile applications and to ensure

maintenance of continuous and smooth supplies of petroleum products by way of reselling and transportation and to further enhance

marketing infrastructure and reseller network for providing assured service to customers throughout the country and to do all such act

which is necessary to attainment of the main object.
name: ZENHAWK TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: To carry on the business of Software designing & development, customization, implementation, maintenance, training in field of information technologies, Software Testing and benchmarking, designing, developing and dealing in computer software, mobile application development, designing and solutions, creating and maintaining an online portal, and to import, export, sell, purchase, distribute, host or otherwise deal in own and third party computer software packages, programs and solutions, and to provide internet / website designing, maintenance and development and web based applications, services and solutions, provide or take up Information Technology related assignments on sub-contracting basis, offering services on-site / offsite or through development centers using owned / hired or third party infrastructure and equipment, providing solutions, packages, services through applications services provider mode via internet or otherwise, to undertake Information Technologies enabled services and in providing consultancy services, marketing in software packages and dealing Information Technology related products and Technologies, Software Developments onsite and off-shore outsourcing all above mentioned areas in India or abroad and to carry on activities incidental and ancillary to the attainment of the abovementioned objects.
name: BABY SPACE PRIVATE LIMITED
